content: let s have fun with this juicy dishcloth that brings a tropical flair to the kitchen lily sugar n cream sets the stage for your imagination with vibrant colors to complete this juicy piece just as you see it featuring hot orange it s a great piece for the cottage kitchen materials lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m main color mc country yellow 01612 1 ball or 66 yds/50 m contrast b sage green 00084 1 ball or 14 yds/13 m note 1 ball of mc will make 2 dishcloths measurements approx 7 x 12 18 x 30 5 cm
